structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.catch_line: Authority must restore damaged public works.
law.text: Any public ways or public works damaged or destroyed by reason of the building of low-income housing shall be restored or repaired by the authority and placed in their original condition as nearly as practicable.
law.history: Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 237, sec. 9, effective July 15, 1996. -- Amended 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 361, sec. 9, effective July 13, 1984. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 927a-9, 2741x-9.
